name: Nameless Knight
description:
Game ini merupakan submisi Muhammad Rizqi Agung Prabowo (1706074801) untuk Gamejam Gamedev Course 2020.

Gitlab link:  https://gitlab.com/mrap22/csui-gamejam-2020

Controls:

[W,A,S,D]: Movement

[Shift]: Show Sword Throw Direction

[Hold Shift + Left Click]: Throw Sword at direction

[Mouse Move Left & Mouse Move Right] : Rotate Sword Throw Direction

[Q]: Return sword after thrown

[E]: Teleport to Sword

Story:

This game tells a story about a nameless knight, fighting monsters in an unknown world.

Gamejam Details:

DIversifier:

- Teleportation

- Melee Combat

- Enemy AOE Attack

Because of variouse reason, a lot of feature was not implemented. A lot of assets and codes is in the game already, but there was not enough time to implemet them correctly. One of the reason is feature creep and misjudgement on the game's complexity.

Implemented feature:

-Movement

-Teleportaion

Not implemented:

- Enemy AI

- Enemy Attack

- Player Attack

- UI

-Respawn System

-Checkpoint system
